channel.title: Blogs on Considérations inactuelles
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Considérations inactuelles

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: I intend to use this blog to keep a trace of the various notes and musings I produce about subjects that interest me. Hopefully the reader will find some of it useful, entertaining or even (gasp!) thought-provoking.
